champ:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
champ:Taunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL champ:Combo.

champ:StanceDance.NAME: Stance Dance
champ:StanceDance.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Stance to Enter. NL If you were already in that Stance, gain a champ:Combo of that Stance.
champ:StanceDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a Stance to Enter. NL Gain a champ:Combo of that Stance.

champ:FaceSlap.NAME: Face Slap
champ:FaceSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL champ:Combo.

champ:DefensiveShout.NAME: Defensive Shout
champ:DefensiveShout.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 champ:Counter. NL Enter champ:Defensive.

champ:BobAndWeave.NAME: Bob and Weave
champ:BobAndWeave.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL Enter champ:Berserker.

champ:AllOut.NAME: All Out
champ:AllOut.DESCRIPTION: Gain a copy of your current Stance's Finisher card. NL Exhaust.

champ:GutPunch.NAME: Gut Punch
champ:GutPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Gain 1 champ:Counter.

champ:FanOfKnives.NAME: Fan of Knives
champ:FanOfKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Exhaust.

champ:Devastate.NAME: Devastate
champ:Devastate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each Finisher played this combat.

champ:Circumvent.NAME: Circumvent
champ:Circumvent.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL champ:Combo.

champ:SkillfulDodge.NAME: Skillful Dodge
champ:SkillfulDodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 champ:Counter. NL If in *Defensive *Stance, gain 1 champ:Counter.

champ:TornadoPunch.NAME: Tornado Punch
champ:TornadoPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block for each enemy hit.

champ:EnGarde.NAME: En Garde
champ:EnGarde.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your Block is broken this turn, gain !B! Block next turn.

champ:MomentOfTruth.NAME: Moment of Truth
champ:MomentOfTruth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL champ:Combo. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

champ:EnchantShield.NAME: Enchant Shield
champ:EnchantShield.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL Increase its Block by !M! for this combat. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: A poor time for that move.

champ:BringItOn.NAME: Bring It On
champ:BringItOn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 champ:Counter. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am not in a Stance.

champ:RopeADope.NAME: Rope-a-dope
champ:RopeADope.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

champ:TechnicalJig.NAME: Technical Jig
champ:TechnicalJig.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter a Stance, gain !M! Block.
champ:TechnicalJig.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you enter a Stance, gain !M! Block.

champ:HoldFirm.NAME: Hold Firm
champ:HoldFirm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 champ:Counter. NL Gain 1 bronze:Blur.

champ:IronFortress.NAME: Iron Fortress
champ:IronFortress.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Dexterity. NL At the end of each turn, gain !M! Block.

champ:Piledriver.NAME: Piledriver
champ:Piledriver.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 2 Weak. NL Apply 2 Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

champ:ViciousMockery.NAME: Vicious Mockery
champ:ViciousMockery.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy gains 1 Strength. NL Gain !M! Vigor.

champ:PreciseThrust.NAME: Precise Thrust
champ:PreciseThrust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If not in a Stance, deal !D! damage.

champ:CrookedStrike.NAME: Crooked Strike
champ:CrookedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Does not consume Vigor.

champ:RapidStrikes.NAME: Rapid Strikes
champ:RapidStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL A "Strike" card in your hand costs 0 this turn.

champ:EnchantSword.NAME: Enchant Sword
champ:EnchantSword.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL Increase its damage by !M! for this combat. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: A poor time for that move.

champ:FlurryOfStrikes.NAME: Flurry of Strikes
champ:FlurryOfStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next "Strike" card you play this turn is played twice.

champ:SwordThrow.NAME: Sword Throw
champ:SwordThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL  Enter champ:Berserker. Until you leave it, cards gained from *Combo are upgraded.

champ:MurderStrike.NAME: Murder Strike
champ:MurderStrike.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When you *Combo, this deals !M! more damage this combat.

champ:MasterfulSlash.NAME: Masterful Slash
champ:MasterfulSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain a random *Combo. NL It costs 0.
champ:MasterfulSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain a random Upgraded *Combo. NL It costs 0.

champ:CheapShot.NAME: Cheap Shot
champ:CheapShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is a Boss, deal damage two more times. If not, hermit:Stun it. NL Exhaust.

champ:RisingStrike.NAME: Rising Strike
champ:RisingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last played card was a champ:Finisher, gain [E] and draw a card.

champ:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
champ:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: Remove the enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage.
champ:Shatter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove the enemy's Block and Artifact. NL Deal !D! damage.

champ:EnragedBash.NAME: Enraged Bash
champ:EnragedBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If in *Berserker *Stance, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

champ:ShieldThrow.NAME: Shield Throw
champ:ShieldThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

champ:AdrenalArmor.NAME: Adrenal Armor
champ:AdrenalArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your last played card was an Attack, gain 1 Strength.

champ:CrownThrow.NAME: Crownarang
champ:CrownThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL champ:Combo. NL Gain a *Returning *Crown next turn.

champ:CrownThrowReturn.NAME: Returning Crown
champ:CrownThrowReturn.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL champ:Combo. NL Exhaust.

champ:Encircle.NAME: Encircle
champ:Encircle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL champ:Combo.

champ:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
champ:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: Once you get below 50% HP, remove all debuffs and gain !M! Strength.

champ:RecklessStrike.NAME: Reckless Strike
champ:RecklessStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL Lose 1 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
champ:RecklessStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL Lose 1 Dexterity.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: A poor time for that move.

champ:IgnorePain.NAME: Ignore Pain
champ:IgnorePain.DESCRIPTION: Your HP cannot be reduced until your next turn. NL Exhaust.
champ:IgnorePain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your HP cannot be reduced until your next turn. NL Exhaust.

champ:DeathBlow.NAME: Death Blow
champ:DeathBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL Exhaust.

champ:ArenaPreparation.NAME: Arena Preparation
champ:ArenaPreparation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! random Skills. NL They gain Retain. NL Exhaust.

champ:SteelEdge.NAME: Steel Edge
champ:SteelEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL champ:Combo X times. NL If this generates a *Finisher, immediately re-enter your current Stance.

champ:Improvising.NAME: Improvising
champ:Improvising.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a champ:Combo each turn, return it to your hand. NL It costs 0 until played.

champ:PerfectedStrike.NAME: Perfecter Strike
champ:PerfectedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your "Strike" cards.

champ:GladiatorForm.NAME: Gladiator Form
champ:GladiatorForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! Vigor for every 3 Vigor spent last turn.

champ:Challenge.NAME: Challenge
champ:Challenge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has Strength, repeat these effects once.
champ:Challenge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has Strength, repeat these effects once.

champ:DancingMaster.NAME: Dancing Master
champ:DancingMaster.DESCRIPTION: The first time you use a champ:Finisher each turn, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

champ:StrikeOfGenius.NAME: Strike of Genius
champ:StrikeOfGenius.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a random "Strike". NL It costs 0 until played and gains Exhaust.
champ:StrikeOfGenius.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a random Upgraded "Strike". NL It costs 0 until played and gains Exhaust.

champ:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
champ:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

champ:Endure.NAME: Endure
champ:Endure.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL This card's Block is increased by Strength instead of Dexterity.
champ:Endure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL This card's Block is increased by Strength.

champ:PreemptiveStrike.NAME: Preemptive Strike
champ:PreemptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each each stack of champ:Counter you have.

champ:Parry.NAME: Parry
champ:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you create a *Riposte this turn, it costs 0.

champ:EnchantCrown.NAME: Enchant Crown
champ:EnchantCrown.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL It costs 0 this combat. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: A poor time for that move.

champ:FancyFootwork.NAME: Fancy Footwork
champ:FancyFootwork.DESCRIPTION: Enter a Stance you aren't in. NL The next champ:Finisher this turn deals !M! damage to ALL enemies.

champ:TripleStrike.NAME: Triple Strike
champ:TripleStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 *Strikes. They cost 0 and gain champ:Combo. NL Exhaust.
champ:TripleStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 Upgraded *Strikes. They cost 0 and gain champ:Combo. NL Exhaust.

champ:WindUp.NAME: Wind Up
champ:WindUp.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Stance to Enter. NL Fetch a champ:Combo from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
champ:WindUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a Stance to Enter. NL Fetch a champ:Combo from your draw pile.

champ:Headbutt.NAME: Headbutt
champ:Headbutt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

champ:Invigorate.NAME: Invigorate
champ:Invigorate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

champ:TheTrophy.NAME: The Trophy
champ:TheTrophy.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL The next card you play is upgraded permanently. NL Exhaust.
champ:TheTrophy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL The next !M! cards you play are upgraded permanently. NL Exhaust.

champ:CalculateMove.NAME: CalculateMove
champ:CalculateMove.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, then discard 1. NL champ:Combo.

champ:ShieldWall.NAME: Shield Wall
champ:ShieldWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL For each hit fully Blocked this turn, gain !M! Vigor.

champ:Hammerblow.NAME: Hammerblow
champ:Hammerblow.DESCRIPTION: Deal 8 damage. NL Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies. NL champ:Combo. champ:Combo.

champ:Hamstring.NAME: Hamstring
champ:Hamstring.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If in *Gladiator *Stance, enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

champ:PumpIron.NAME: Pump Iron
champ:PumpIron.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain !M! Vigor.

champ:StandYourGround.NAME: Stand Your Ground
champ:StandYourGround.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enter champ:Defensive. Until you leave it, cards gained from *Combo are upgraded.

champ:BattleCry.NAME: Battle Cry
champ:BattleCry.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Enter champ:Gladiator. Until you leave it, cards gained from *Combo are upgraded.

champ:WarmupRoutine.NAME: Warmup Routine
champ:WarmupRoutine.DESCRIPTION: When you start your turn while not in a Stance, gain 1 Strength.
champ:WarmupRoutine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you start your turn while not in a Stance, gain 1 Strength.
